Saurabh Bhatia

Engineer, architect, and relentless problem solver. I design and deliver enterprise solutions that blend technology, business, and user experience—always with a spirit of curiosity and adventure.

Key Focus Areas

Engineer at Heart

Seasoned technical expert with deep hands-on experience spanning hardware design, embedded systems, software architecture, and enterprise platform engineering. Built robust solutions from microcontroller to cloud applications and infrastructure across multiple industries.

Amplified by AI

Empowered by the latest AI and automation technologies, I stay at the forefront of innovation—leveraging tools to drive future growth. My work is empowered by continuous learning and hands-on experimentation, enabling me to create solutions that shape what’s next.

Leader by Nature

Visionary leader building and guiding high-performing teams across finance and technology. I drive strategic direction, foster collaboration, mentor talent, and deliver results in complex, global environments. Passionate about empowering teams to exceed goals and create value.
